definitions.definition: The act of irradiating; emission of rays of light.
That which irradiates or is irradiated; lustre ; splendour ; brilliancy .
The radiant power received by unit area of surface .

main_definition: The act of irradiating; emission of rays of light.
secondary_definitions: That which irradiates or is irradiated; lustre ; splendour ; brilliancy .
( physics ) The radiant power received by unit area of surface .
